title: Requires bicycles used for commercial purposes to be registered
summary: Requires all bicycles used for commercial purposes including, but not limited to, bicycle delivery and messenger services to be registered with the department of motor vehicles and insured; requires operators of such bicycles to possess a form of identification; provides that a violation of such provisions constitutes a misdemeanor punishable by a fine of not more than $100 or imprisonment for not more than 20 days.

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation  to  commercial
         bicycles

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The vehicle and traffic law is  amended  by  adding  a  new
    2  section 401-c to read as follows:
    3    S 401-C. REGISTRATION OF COMMERCIAL BICYCLES. EVERY BICYCLE ENGAGED IN
    4  COMMERCIAL  BUSINESS IN THIS STATE, INCLUDING BICYCLE MESSENGER SERVICES
    5  AND BICYCLE DELIVERY  SERVICES  CONNECTED  TO  RESTAURANTS,  PHARMACIES,
    6  GROCERY,  DRUG OR ANY OTHER RETAIL STORES, SHALL BE REGISTERED AND IDEN-
    7  TIFIED AS A COMMERCIAL BICYCLE, AS PROVIDED  IN  THIS  SECTION.  SUCH  A
    8  COMMERCIAL  BICYCLE  SHALL BE ISSUED A LICENSE PLATE IDENTIFYING IT AS A
    9  "COMMERCIAL BICYCLE". AN OPERATOR OF A COMMERCIAL BICYCLE  MUST  HAVE  A
   10  FORM  OF IDENTIFICATION PROVIDING HIS OR HER NAME.  REGISTRANTS SHALL BE
   11  ISSUED REGISTRATION CARDS WHICH MUST BE CARRIED WHILE OPERATING A  BICY-
   12  CLE  FOR COMMERCIAL PURPOSES. THE DEPARTMENT SHALL ISSUE A LIST OF TRAF-
   13  FIC REGULATIONS PERTAINING TO BICYCLE OPERATION FOR EACH BICYCLE  REGIS-
   14  TERED.  ALL  COMMERCIAL BICYCLES SHALL BE EQUIPPED WITH SAFETY FEATURES,
   15  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, REFLECTORS OR LIGHTS FOR NIGHTTIME OPERA-
   16  TION. ALL OPERATORS OF COMMERCIAL BICYCLES SHALL  BE  REQUIRED  TO  WEAR
   17  BICYCLE  HELMETS.  REGISTRANTS SHALL OBTAIN PROPERTY AND CASUALTY INSUR-
   18  ANCE TO COVER ANYONE WHO  OPERATES  A  COMMERCIAL  BICYCLE.  FAILURE  TO
   19  REGISTER  A  COMMERCIAL BICYCLE OR TO COMPLY WITH ANY OTHER PROVISION OF
